title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.273 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.273 - General

State Regulations
(a) The pipeline
must be designed and installed so that each joint will sustain the longitudinal
pullout or thrust forces caused by contraction or expansion of the piping or by
anticipated external or internal loading. (b) Each joint must be made in accordance
with written procedures that have been proved by test or experience to produce
strong gas-tight joints. (c) Each
joint must be inspected to ensure compliance with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.273

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
